scripts.install:all: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.dev:http: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev:http" "npm --prefix client run dev:http"
scripts.dev:https: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev:https" "npm --prefix client run dev:https"
scripts.build: npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix client run build
